titleStmt.title: Nicholas Thorne versus John Goodrich, executor of the last will and testament of Robert Thorne the elder. Answer of John Goodrich to the bill of complaint. 1533 - 1538

abstract.p: Answer of John Goodrich to the bill of complaint by Nicholas Thorne.

div.p:
The answer of John Goodrigge clerk
to the byll of complaint of Nicholas Thorne

The seyd John Goodrigge seythe that the seyde Bille ys Incerten &and Insufficient in the lawe to be Answeryd unto &and the matter therin Contrived &and Imagenyd to the only Intente to putte the seyd deffendant to vexacion troble &and loste off hys Goodes And also maner determinable att the Comon lawe &and not in thys honorable Courte wherof he
paythe alowance the Advantage theroff to hym savyd ffor declaracon off trewythe the seyd John Goodrigge seythe that xvij yeres passyd or ther abowtes the seyd Robert Thorne ffather unto the seyd complaynente ordenyd &and made the seyd John Goodrigge William Wosley &and John Wyett of the Towne of Bristoll marchantez hys executors
&and died after whose Dethe they &and every of them toke apon them the administracion off the Goodes off the seyd Robert Thorne ther Testator And seythe that the seyd Robert Thorne ther Testator by hys last wyll &and Testament amonge other thinges devised &and bequethyd L xxxxiiij Tone of salte wyche then was in hys possession
too be sold bye hys Executors &and the money Comynge theroff shuld be by the seyd Executors yerely delyvered &and delyd unto pore pepulle within the seyd Towne of Bristoll &and prisoners ther ffor the tyme beynge that ys to sey yerely xxxij s untylle the hole Some of money soo made of ?ther disposed &and delyvered ffor the relef &and comforte
by reson wherof the seyd John Goodrigge &and the other above namyd Executors solde the seyd lxxxxiiijte Tone of salte unto the seyd Nicholez Thorne nowe Complaynante for the Som of lxxx li &and accordynge to the confidence &and truste to them gevyn by the seyd Testator delyvered &and delvyd unto pore pepull .... within the seyd towne
of Bristoll by the space of iiij yeres nexte &and Immedietly after the dethe of the seyd Testator yerely xxxij s as the seyd Deffendant nowe remembrythe / &and then the seyd Executors of ther Charitable ?mosionz remembring the good disposission of ther seyd Testator towardes the almez to pore pepulle to the Intente the ... ... the seyd
Charitable almez to Continue ffor ever provydyd wtwith þethe residew of the seyd lxxx li in ther handes &and more money by the seyd John Goodrygge leyde owte and payde purchesyd &and bowte Certen landes &and tenementes in the seyd Towne of Bristoll to the seyd yerely value of xxxij s &and above wyche landes soo purchesyd at the tyme of þethe same purchase warr
Rewen &and decayed &and after the seyd purchase the seyd William Woseley &and John Wyett diede &and þethe seyd orator in &and abowte the reparynge &and amendynge of the same hathe bestowed &and spente agret some of hys own propere money to the intente he wolde have them Contynue ffor the seyd yerely payment of the seyd som of xxxij s
too pore pepulle ffor the perfformanz of the laste wylle of the said Robert Thor[ne] hys Testator &and soo Intendythe too leve ytt yff the lawez of the Realme wyll that permitt &and suffer or otherwyse he Intendythe to see the seyd laste wylle &and Testamente off the seyd Robert Thorne ffulffyllyd &and perfformyd And saythe þtthat by monez of the said
purches &and repracienz the seyd landes ?or of the yerely value of iiij li or ther abowtes wtowtewithowte that that any soche comunicacion was hadde &and ?movyd betwene the seyd Complaynante Robert Thorne hys brother on the on partye &and the seyd defendant on þethe other partye Conernynge the makynge Establesshynge &and Contynuance of a ffre scole ...
ffor the seyd landes mensioned in the seyd bylle of Complaynte in maner &and fforme as in the seyd Bylle of Complaynte ys ontrewly surmisyd ffor the seyd defendant seythe that the seyd Robert Thorne the son was Indettyd unto Robert Thorne hys ffather at the tyme that hys seyd ffather dyed in the som of CCL li wyche was in the handes
off the seyd Robert Thorne the son in the partyez by yonde the see &and ther the seyd Robert Thorn retayned the seyd CCL li by the space of ix yeres or ther abowtes after the decesse off hys seyd ffather &and ffor the payment theroff beffore the seyd Roberte Thorn the Son Came into Inglonde the seyd Nicholez Thorn was boundon by hys sufficient
dede obligatorie in the seyd Som off CCL li to the seyd John Goodrigge &and John Wyott the other executor then levynge ffor the trewe paymente theroff &and hyt was agreyd betwene the seyd Nicholas Thorne oon the oon partye &and the seyd John Goodrigge &and John Wyatt oon the other partye that the seyd Som off CCL shulde be imployde
&and bestowed in the purchesse of the landes &and howse of a hospitall in Bristoll ffor to have a ffree Scole ther ffowndyd or ffor the purchesynge of other Certen landes in the seyd Towne of Bristoll to have a free Scole in the same Towne wherwythe the same deffendant wtwith the seyd John Wyott was well Contentyd that the seyd Som
of CCL li shulde be convertyd to the same use &and Intente &and so the seyd Nicholas Thorn Robert Thorn the Son wythe the seyd John Godrigge barganed &and bowte the seyd hospitall &and all the landes to the same hospitall belongyng Callyd the Bartilmewez in Bristol afforeseyd wher Certen pore men &and wemen ... the ...
nombre off iiij wer &and wekely every of the seyd iiij personz hadde v d in money wyche landes ar soo purchaysyd awell in the same off the seyd Robert Thorn &and Nicholas Thorn as in the name of the seyd John Goodrigge &and Recovere &and other assurans ar Conveyde to them accordyngly And seythe that he often tymez declaryd
unto the seyd Nicholas Thorn that yff the pore pepulle att the seyd hospitall off Seynte Bartilmewe in Bristoll may have ther Continuance ffor ther ffyndynge accordynge to the olde ffoundacione of the seyd hospitall that then the seyd deffendant wolde geve &and grante obave of the seyd landes &and Tenementes by hym purchesyd the
yerely value of xl s towardes the Continuall ffyndynge of the seyd pore pepulle in the seyd hospitall &and towardes the ffyndynge of a honest Scolemaster to teche &and lerne the Chyldren in the trewe art of Grammar ther And seythe that ?sythene hys Chartitable grant ij of the pore pepull ar dedde &and no other ther takyn
into ther stedes &and the seyde Nicholas Thorn Complaynante often tymez hathe reportyd &and declaryd that he wolle have no other pore pepulle ffo them &and yf the reste wer dedde ther shulde no more pore pepull be ther relevyd &and also ther ys noo Scolemaster ther keppyd accordynge to the appoyntemente &and promise of the
seyd Nicholas Thorn Complaynante Wherffore yt dothe not only wtdrawewithdrawe the devosion &and Charite of the seyd deffendant butt the extreme usynge therof by the seyd complaynant uncharitable Causythe other to wtdrawewithdrawe ther devosionz &and good benivolenz wtowtewithowte that that the seyd Robert Thorn the son was indettyd unto the
seyd Robert Thorn hys ffather at the tyme of hys decesse in the seyd Som of Cxvj li &and no more in soche mannere &and fforme as in the seyd byll ys untrwely surmisyd or that the seyd deffendant wt the surplus of the goodes of the seyd Robert Thorne over &and above all dettes &and legaces &and all other Charges borne &and susteyned
purchesyd of landes &and Tenementes wythin the seyd Towne of Bristolle as moche as amountyd to the yerely Som of vj li to hym &and to hys heyres as also in the seyd bylle ys ontrewly surmisyd or that the seyd deffendant ever covenanytd &and agred wythe the seyd Complaynante &and hys seyd brother Robert þtthat yff the seyd Robert Thorne
the yonger wolde paye the seyd some of Cxvj li that he oughe unto hys seyd ffather at the tyme of hys dethe &and also paye CC li of money of hys owne money towardes the purchesynge of Certen landes ffor the seyd ffree scole to be keppyd &and Continued at the Bartilmewez in Bristoll aforeseyd ?that ?Ien nott
only the seyd landes &and tenamentes by the seyd Complaynante surmysd of the seyd yerely value of vj li by purchesyd wtwith the goodes of the seyd Testators &and shulde be assuryd ffor the mayntenance &and Continuance of the seyd ffree Scole in soche manner &and forme as in the seyd byll ys also ontrewly surmisyd or that ?dec ?growes
&and money as remayne in the handes of the seyd deffendant unadministred shuldbe exspendyd &and payed towardes the byldynge &and mayntenance of the seyd Scole in manner &and fforme as also in the seyd byll ys ontrewly aleggyd ffor the seyd John Goodrigge seythe þtthat he hathe leyde owte administred &and ... in &and abowte the
severall dettes legaces &and other Charitable dedes ffor the seyd Robert Thorn hys Testator xxx li or nere ther abowtes over &and above soche goodes as of the seyd Robert Thorn hys Testator ever Came to hys possession or that thet the seyd Scole ys so establesshed &and ffowndyd to hys knowlegge in soche manner &and fforme as in the seyd
byll ys aleggyd or that any other thynge materiall wythin the seyd byll of Complaynte mensioned expressyd or declaryd not beffore traverssyd nether Answeryd ys trewe all wyche matters the seyd defendant ys redy to ?prove as thys honorable Cowrte shall awarde &and prayth that he maye be dismissyd owt
of the same wythe hys resonable costes &and Charges in that behalff ffor hys wrongfulle vexacion &and troble /
